description: Twill weave, vertical and horizontal stripes in different colors that emphasize the twill pattern. Variation of Pomegranate, orange, beige and red-orange warp and weft makes fabric more monochromatic than striped.Machine edged on two sides.Stapled to 8x10.5\" card with 99.1.1185.8.  \"H-8A\" written on card.  Larsen descriptive tag stapled to face. Yellow orange
title: Pomegranate
